title: PLZ PLZ HELP ME MAJOR PROBLEM
body: when i try to log in it says unexpected error occurred while logging in please try again i did and it wont do anything but the same thing. Then i try and launch old legacy  cilent then it wont load it comes up RADS so i look on youtube then i do everything the dns thing cmd thing all of that it still wont log in ive tried all the youtube videos idk how to fix this plz plz i begging u help me

replies.body: It sounds like some setting on your OS is blocking the patcher from launching.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help.  Double check your antivirus too in case any updates might have changed what's being allowed.  I hope that helps!
